attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The A82 the main road from Glasgow to Fort William is in such a bad state that it is now a road that is a death trap to all that use it.
I pay my road tax and you are thinking of putting road charging on top of this. First fix the roads then come back to the car user in say 20 years time.

Keith West Fort William

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
